meanings.definition: A spicy noodle soup dish popular in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious laksa at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best laksa for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The laksa was so spicy, it made me sweat!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of laksa filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent5: The colorful laksa looked like a work of art in the bowl.

meanings.sent2: I love to laksa with my friends on Fridays.
meanings.sent3: She decided to laksa for lunch instead of ordering in.
meanings.sent4: After a long day, I just want to laksa and relax.
meanings.sent5: Laksaing always brings a smile to my face.
